title.rendered: Getting the Most Out of Your Car

content.rendered:
Brand new cars can turn into junk cars in Chicago faster than you think, especially if you don’t do your part to take proper care of it. If you want to get the most life out of your car, make sure to follow these general guidelines.

Get It Serviced

Taking your car in for routine oil changes will keep its efficiency high. If you aren’t sure how often your car’s oil needs to be changed, refer to the manual. It’s also important to keep things like your car’s engine and transmission properly taken care of; if you don’t, your car will die much quicker than it should.

Brake & Tire Maintenance

Brakes are one of the most important facets of your car. If you hear or feel anything abnormal with your brakes while you drive, get it serviced immediately. Also make sure to regularly check your tire pressure and change the tires when need be.

Only Drive When Necessary

The more miles you put on your car, the faster it will be run down. If you’re one to run a lot of errands, try to walk or bike whenever you can. Avoid taking tons of long road trips if possible.

Wash & Wax

Keep your car clean both on the outside and the inside to preserve its life. You can also wax it twice a year to keep the paint in good shape.

Visit Aero Auto Parts for Your Car Needs

If your car needs some TLC, visit Aero Auto Parts for both new and used auto parts. When your car is on its last leg, we are happy to get rid of your junk car in Chicago via our removal services.
Source: DMV
